title: Data Dependence and U.S. Monetary Policy
content: For release on delivery  8:30 a.m. EST  November 27, 2018      Data Dependence and U.S. Monetary Policy         Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     The Clearing House and The Bank Policy Institute Annual Conference     New York, New York                 November 27, 2018
